description: Asparagus scramble recipe is perfect for Mother's day or any day, breakfast, lunch. or dinner. Enjoy it with toast & smoked salmon. Perfect!
name: Every-Day-Is-Mother's-Day Part 2: Asparagus and Scallion Scramble

recipeInstructions.text: Wash asparagus well. Discard ends and cut them into 2-inch pieces
Slice scallions (white and light green parts)
In a large skillet heat the olive oil. Add asparagus and scallions and cook at medium heat for about 5 minutes.
Add 2 tbsp water. Cover pan and continue cooking until the asparagus are tender.
Add the eggs, mix them well together with the asparagus and scallions. Cook until done, about 2 minutes.
Serve with toasted multigrain bread drizzled with extra virgin olive oil, salt and pepper to taste, and smoked salmon. Garnish with lemon and chives.
ENJOY! From May I have that recipe

video.description: A quick and easy video recipe to learn how to make Asparagus and Scallion Scramble  For a full recipe and exact measurements visit http://mayihavethatrecipe.com/2012/05/04/asparagus-and-scallion-scramble/ where you will find many more video recipes.
